DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , extension , Phase III study evaluate long-term safety efficacy MRA patient RA participate Study MRA012JP .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Treatment Study MRA Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA ) From Study MRA012JP
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Patients must suffer RA , must participate precede study . Patients must confirm appropriate week 52 preceding study X radiography . Exclusion criteria Patients evaluate belong Steinbrocker 's class IV within 4 week administration study drug Patients register 3 month week 52 preceding study
